body.name: Shark UV580 Performance UltraLight Corded Stick Vacuum with DuoClean and Self-Cleaning Brushroll, Includes Duster Crevice & Upholstery Tools, Removable Handheld, Blue (Renewed)
features: DUOCLEAN TECHNOLOGY: A dual-brushroll system designed to deep-clean carpets and directly engage floors for a polished look.
SELF-CLEANING BRUSHROLL: Powerful pet hair pickup and no more hair wrap.
PERFECT FOR PETS: Provides ultra-powerful pet hair pickup on floors, carpets, and above-floor areas like stairs and furniture.
ULTRA-LIGHTWEIGHT: Powerful suction in a hand vacuum that weighs less than 3 lbs.
LIGHTWEIGHT HANDHELD VACUUM: The stick vacuum cleaner transforms into a lightweight, portable handheld vacuum to take your cleaning above the floor—on furniture, stairs, and more.
ADVANCED SWIVEL STEERING: Lets you easily maneuver your vacuum in and out of tight spaces, in corners, around furniture, and more.
LED HEADLIGHTS: Powerful LED lights Illuminate hidden debris and dust around your home.
EASY-EMPTY REMOVABLE DUST CUP: Eject debris with ease and wash the dust cup whenever you need to.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: Shark UV580 Stick Vacuum, Duster Crevice Tool, Upholstery Tool.
body.description: The Shark Performance UltraLight corded stick features the DuoClean dual-brushroll system to deep-clean carpets and directly engage floors, and a hand vac that weighs under 3 pounds but packs big suction power. The self-cleaning brushroll delivers powerful pickup with no hair wrap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This vacuum is amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I had a shark cordless vacuum that putted out after 3 years of continuous use. I was thinking about getting another cordless one, but the charging before vacuuming idea didn't sit well with me anymore. I decided to try this one out, seeing as it was cheap and a shark/ninja, my favorite brand for most things.This thing is amazing. When I tell you the suction is awesome, I'm not joking. When I first took it out for a spin, I was very impressed when I noticed that I would go straight but the vacuum would suck up things that were on the side of my straight line. I was very impressed. I also like the attachment that has the crevice tool with the brush built-in very innovative. The cord is very long and I can get most of my downstairs without having to move the plug. I shed hair everywhere, but the mechanism of the brush makes it so the hair doesn't get stuck! Also, it's low profile design goes under a lot of my furniture so I don't have to move things around. And it's so light! Overall, this vacuum is beyond amazing and I would highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for this nifty little machine!
reviews.reviewText: This is my first stick vacuum purchase. I had no idea what I was missing out on! It’s so easy to maneuver around and under furniture. I like that you can remove the handheld nozzle and use that on things like couches or stairs. Or keep the pole attached in order to reach things that are further away. It’s a powerful little machine. I wanted one with a cord because I have a fairly large area to cover and didn’t want to deal with recharging or reduced power as the battery fades. It has a nice, long cord. You can also remove the top handheld nozzle and hang it on the machine so that it stores in a compact, upright position. It does get pretty warm after using it a while, but there’s no indication that anything is being damaged. I do wish the dust bin was larger, but it’s very easy to empty. Easy access to filter for cleaning. I’m using this on my hardwood and tile flooring and using my full size Dyson for the carpeted areas. I like that this has a soft brush that is gentle on my floors and does a good job picking up dust and small debris. As far as purchasing a renewed item, I honestly couldn’t tell that it wasn’t brand new. There were no visible blemishes. Everything was included and so far in perfect working condition after approximately 2 months of nearly daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am obsessed
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely obsessed with this lil vacuum!! I thought my apt with no storage closet was too small for a vacuum but this fits in such a tiny space. It's super powerful and SO easy to use all the different options (full vacuum, just the wand, etc). I have a 750 sq foot apt that is vertically spread out and the cord (plugged into the middle room) reached 90% of my apt. Really easy to clean out the debris - I will probably need to clean it out after each full apt use but that's okay bc of how easy it is to do so. Kinda annoying that it doesn't stand on its own but I appreciate that you can store it upright by removing the top part and hanging it from the bottom. I have a dog and this got up dog hair that I didn't even know existed + all the fall leaves that track into my house. This is my first Amazon review ever, I am just so jazzed about the vacuum!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love hate relationship
reviews.reviewText: I wanted this for quickly running over the floors in my house.The good:1. Great sucking power.2. Convenient accessories.3. Quality head and rollers.4. Love the headlight it has to highlight dirt/debris!The bad:1. It doesn’t stand up in its own. Literally defeats the purpose of a quick vacuum as I have to gently lay it down or unhook the top and hang it from the bottom so it doesn’t fall over every time I have to move/pick up something it shouldn’t suck up like cords, etc?2.I’m short and it’s uncomfortable and challenging for me to use. The angle I have to use it at often makes it click into the upright “lock” position and the handle being so long makes it really hard to maneuver for my 5ft stature.3. You have to make yourself a little tool belt or something for all the accessories if you want them with you while you clean because they have no onboard storage for them.So far the refurbished status doesn’t seem to be attributable to any of the faults I have with the product and so far it seems to work great although it does get pretty hot after a short time so I hope that’s no indicative of future issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for a light weight vacuum that I could use that would help get my vacuuming done and was easy on my back. This gets the job done, love the versatility of the tools, and ability to use for car clean up. Like the long cord, cup is small, but no biggie, actually like it that way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More powerful than it looks!
reviews.reviewText: Love this vac! I have the older model, but the motor is heavier and being on the top of the stick made it tougher on my back. I’m a disabled Veteran and vacuuming is the most difficult household chore for me. This vacuum is a lot lighter, smaller and super easy to maneuver anywhere you need to go. I can get it under my bed without difficulty and it almost drags me along for the ride. This refurb came in excellent condition. Looks brand new! With the flaps on the roller, fur a hair doesn’t get tangled. It just sorta wraps around the filter in the bin. The only downside is that the removable bin is kinda small, so you’re making more trips to the garbage can, but otherwise it makes vacuuming a lot easier for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought a brand new shark cordless vac from Walmart for $150 on sale, from the start it was average at best. I had no idea what I was missing til I read reviews on this vacuum and decided to take the plunge. For a quarter of the price I have a vacuum that tackles everything, especially cat and dog hair. It doesn’t plug the vacuum up! I have vinyl flooring, rugs, and carpeted stairs. It handles it all so well, I’m beyond impressed! It’s easy to clean the canister. Some minor negatives - It does not sit upright on its own. The turn angle can be awkward and sometimes hard to maneuver around edges. The battery pack feels warm after 10 min of cleaning. Knowing all this, I would still re-purchase !
Esta increíble esta aspiradora la recomiendo muchoSi estás pensando en comprar una está es la mejor opciónDefinitivamente la mejor aspiradora que he tenido

Bought the Shark UV580 corded stick vacuum for my elderly parents. They had the Shark Navigator upright vacuum previously, but wanted a lighter one with same capability and power. So no cordless. The UV580 was a older model, cheaper than current models. It had dual powered rollers, LED lights, swivel, easy empty, crevice tool, and furniture brush. My only issues were the vacuum is not self-standing, and stacking the hand-unit on the base seem a little loose/unstable. Wish list: If the cord could be retractable somehow.
Está increíble la aspiradora. Fácil de usar, con luz, llega a lugares de difícil acceso, liviana. En general, me encantó.
Excelente, pese al cable puedo decir que es portátil, versátil y práctico
